books.title: Xakameynta Waqtiga
books.author: Brian Tracy
books.description: Buuggani wuxuu si cilmiyeysan uga hadlayaa sida waqtiga loo maareeyo iyo habka looga hortago waxyaalaha waqtiga lumiyo. Waxaa laga tarjumay buugga Brian Tracy oo khabiir ku ah maaraynta waqtiga.

books.title: Mucjisada Aroortii
books.author: Hal Elrod
books.description: Buuggani wuxuu si cilmiyeysan uga hadlayaa sida aad subax walba ugu bilowdo ficillo dhiirrigelinaya, kaas oo kuu horseedi kara guulo weyn noloshaada.

books.title: Falsafadda Jiraalnimadu Waa Insaannimo
books.author: Jaan Bool Saartar
books.description: Buuggani wuxuu diiradda saarayaa falsafadda Jiraalnimada, isagoo sharraxaya muhiimadda nolosha insaanka iyo ka mid ahaanshaha bulshooyinka casriga ah.

books.title: 50 Talooyin Caafimaad Ah
books.author: Dr. Maxamed Warsame Jaamac
books.description: Buuggan wuxuu ka hadlayaa 50 talooyin caafimaad oo muhiim ah.

books.title: Arimaha ka Taagan Soomaaliya Maxaa Xal u ah?
books.author: Sheekh Dr. Cuthmaan Macallim Maxamuud
books.description: Buuggan wuxuu ka hadlayaa mushkiladaha ka taagan Soomaaliya iyo sida loogu heli karo xal ku dhisan mabaadi'da Islaamka.

books.title: Hada Baro ChatGPT Prompts
books.author: Mahamed Yasin Mohamoud
books.description: Buuggan wuxuu ku bari doonaa sida loo isticmaalo ChatGPT prompts si ay kuu caawiso dhinacyo badan oo nolosha ah.

books.title: Daawada Jaceylka
books.author: Hassan Sheikow
books.description: Buuggani wuxuu ka hadlaya daawada jaceylka, isagoo si faahfaahsan u sharaxaya sida qalbiga loogu daaweeyo jaceylka iyo xalinta dhibaatooyinka la xiriira la qabsiga qof.

books.title: Dheefta Suugaanta
books.author: Tawakal Cabdi Ismaaciil (Abwaan Xays)
books.description: Buuggani wuxuu sharaxaad ka bixinayaa qiimaha iyo waxtarka suugaanta Soomaalida, isagoo ka hadlaya taariikhda, dhaqanka, iyo kaalinta ay ku leedahay bulshada.

books.title: Forex Beginner Complete
books.author: Mohamed Elmi Isse
books.description: Buuggani wuxuu sharaxaad faahfaahsan ka bixinayaa ganacsiga Forex ee loogu talagalay bilowga. Waxaa ku jira talooyin iyo istaraatiijiyo muhiim ah oo ganacsiga lagu guulaysto.

books.title: Inankeygiyoo
books.author: Sh. Ali Al-Tantawi
books.description: Buuggan waa qoraal ka jawaabaya arrimaha dhalinyarada, gaar ahaan xalinta dhibaatooyinka ay la kulmaan wiilasha, isagoo bixiya talooyin iyo tusaalooyin nolosha lagu hagaajin karo.

books.title: Casharo Nololeed: Xasuusihii Sheekh Cali Al-Dandaawi
books.author: Cabdi Jabbaar Dawla
books.description: Buuggan wuxuu ka kooban yahay casharo muhiim ah oo laga bartay nolosha Sheekh Cali Al-Dandaawi iyo waaya-aragnimadiisa.

books.title: 48 Sharci ee Awooda
books.author: Ismail Abdi Ismail
books.description: Buuggan wuxuu sharaxayaa 48 sharci oo awood lagu kasbado, laguna maareeyo xiriirka bulshada iyo shaqada.

books.title: Qisooyinka Nabiyada
books.author: Unknown
books.description: Buuggani wuxuu soo koobayaa qisooyinka nabiyada oo si fudud loogaga sheekeeyay, una sahlan in carruurta iyo dadka waaweyn ka faa'iidaystaan.
